ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Giant Grub Digger
ygData.msgSnippet: nope Bards don t have any 2h weapon skill.  It s there because it s in the character profile and wasn t taken out.  Long long long ago (beta .5) bards might
ygData.messageBody:
nope Bards don't have any 2h weapon skill. It's there because it's in the
character profile and wasn't taken out. Long long long ago (beta .5) bards
might have had 2hs but I'm not even sure on that.

Lyrnia
----- Original Message -----
From: "Rolaleil LeLandont" <rolaleil@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 01, 2000 4:07 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Giant Grub Digger


> Hi!
>
> This guy just gave me a Giant Grub Digger (12dam/47dly, +20HP, +5
> SVDisease), *2HS* weapon that can be wielded by bards! Now, last
> time I visited the Bard Guild, my trainer didn't offer me 2hs as a
> skill, and I've always heard that 2HS is not available to bards
> anyway, YET I can and have wielded this thing! In truth, using this
> is not as effective as my Drachnid Leg Tip, but I think it's because
> Bards are NOT ABLE to increase their 2HS skill. Also, the only time
> I do any REAL damage (25-28 per hit!) is when I'm whistling the war
> song, otherwise I rarely hit above 10.
>
> Does anyone have any information on this? Have any bards been able
> to establish and improve a 2HS skill? If so, bards just got a GREAT
> soloing weapon!
>
> ~Rolaleil
> Bard of the 15th Song
> E'ci Server
>
>
